Name: Schollii
AboutMe:
Software development for me is a craft. I like robustness and doing things "the right way". I love creating designs that "can do lots"; going that extra mile keeps my mind engaged. But first and foremost for me is usability and practicality.

As my contribution to the online community, I maintain three open source projects: on sourceforge I have lua-icxx to embed Lua in C++ without having to use the Lua stack, PyPubSub to support publish-subscribe architecture in Python, and IOF to provide printf-like formatted output via C++ streams.

Next programming language on my list when I have time: clojure or scala!

Programming languages I most use:

  • C++ (including templates)
  • Python
  • Lua
  • C#

Domains of expertise:

  • System and process modeling and simulation
  • Virtual Reality
  • Publish-subscribe (i.e. Event-based) and Distributed architectures

Skillfull at:

  • System Architecture and Design
  • Component integration (interprocess communication, embedded scripting, plugins)
  • User Interfaces (WPF, wxPython)
